Using Ripe

Source: vignettes/ripe.Rmd
ripe.Rmd
library(ripe)

replicate


stats::runif(20)%>%
  ripe(replicate,n=2,simplify=FALSE)
#> [[1]]
#>  [1] 0.91469450 0.60480330 0.81665416 0.97404952 0.64006023 0.32306639
#>  [7] 0.71375675 0.68706733 0.30093504 0.53245421 0.94226570 0.47774267
#> [13] 0.57421966 0.09846581 0.99985688 0.65419513 0.52512027 0.75024106
#> [19] 0.29598880 0.65066977
#> 
#> [[2]]
#>  [1] 0.111455607 0.203020084 0.513543037 0.410121335 0.338241919 0.530570469
#>  [7] 0.630782825 0.980970890 0.436524386 0.861614308 0.527764641 0.303186834
#> [13] 0.439171903 0.008841132 0.512816997 0.837078305 0.323964061 0.603783880
#> [19] 0.229825936 0.422265823

stats::runif(20)%>%
  sample(10)%>%
  ripe(replicate,n=3,simplify=FALSE)
#> [[1]]
#>  [1] 0.2984798 0.2783991 0.7149512 0.1044112 0.9142447 0.2895787 0.4537005
#>  [8] 0.2231274 0.0603147 0.9560586
#> 
#> [[2]]
#>  [1] 0.15991061 0.91575444 0.42982285 0.91193862 0.67428257 0.78669868
#>  [7] 0.29131413 0.83365637 0.17315200 0.01108713
#> 
#> [[3]]
#>  [1] 0.87371352 0.82647471 0.06817842 0.99725123 0.45734147 0.18405352
#>  [7] 0.27545636 0.65350016 0.24308116 0.90546134

stats::runif(20)%>%
  sample(10)%>%
  utils::head(5)%>%
  ripe(replicate,n=4,simplify=FALSE)
#> [[1]]
#> [1] 0.1024713574 0.3197116612 0.0001128614 0.4528644935 0.4664996918
#> 
#> [[2]]
#> [1] 0.4701079 0.6367437 0.6887841 0.4739552 0.9663724
#> 
#> [[3]]
#> [1] 0.8525297 0.9198180 0.1525338 0.3089456 0.5312963
#> 
#> [[4]]
#> [1] 0.6070352 0.2648457 0.6848451 0.2537540 0.3369446

apply

stats::runif(20)%>%
  sample(10)%>%
  utils::head(5)%>%
  ripe(lapply, X=1:4)
#> [[1]]
#> [1] 0.6879554566 0.8228224893 0.0007299581 0.1205676894 0.2823757825
#> 
#> [[2]]
#> [1] 0.67429183 0.08728738 0.76239491 0.92753006 0.27083783
#> 
#> [[3]]
#> [1] 0.1271802 0.7133826 0.6748721 0.3406660 0.3341402
#> 
#> [[4]]
#> [1] 0.1663683 0.9096800 0.6805576 0.4403557 0.2105634

mclapply

(ncores <- parallel::detectCores())
#> [1] 2
stats::runif(20)%>%
  sample(10)%>%
  utils::head(5)%>%
  ripe(parallel::mclapply, X=1:4, mc.cores = pmin(1,ncores-1))
#> [[1]]
#> [1] 0.2554388 0.7718005 0.4388249 0.8711836 0.6218347
#> 
#> [[2]]
#> [1] 0.2140992 0.1926303 0.9450124 0.6741561 0.1571924
#> 
#> [[3]]
#> [1] 0.9293436 0.1104588 0.2419820 0.6243186 0.7512487
#> 
#> [[4]]
#> [1] 0.4062621 0.3747919 0.7677575 0.5961036 0.9715528

purrr

iris %>% 
  dplyr::sample_n(5) %>% 
  ripe(purrr::rerun,.n=3)
#> [[1]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width Petal.Length Petal.Width    Species
#> 1          5.4         3.0          4.5         1.5 versicolor
#> 2          5.0         3.6          1.4         0.2     setosa
#> 3          6.4         2.8          5.6         2.1  virginica
#> 4          4.8         3.4          1.9         0.2     setosa
#> 5          6.6         2.9          4.6         1.3 versicolor
#> 
#> [[2]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width Petal.Length Petal.Width    Species
#> 1          4.5         2.3          1.3         0.3     setosa
#> 2          5.7         3.0          4.2         1.2 versicolor
#> 3          6.3         3.3          4.7         1.6 versicolor
#> 4          5.7         2.8          4.1         1.3 versicolor
#> 5          6.4         3.2          5.3         2.3  virginica
#> 
#> [[3]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width Petal.Length Petal.Width    Species
#> 1          5.4         3.9          1.3         0.4     setosa
#> 2          5.4         3.0          4.5         1.5 versicolor
#> 3          4.8         3.1          1.6         0.2     setosa
#> 4          7.4         2.8          6.1         1.9  virginica
#> 5          6.2         2.9          4.3         1.3 versicolor

iris %>% 
  dplyr::select(1:2) %>% 
  dplyr::sample_n(20) %>% 
  ripe(purrr::rerun,.n=1)
#> [[1]]
#>    Sepal.Length Sepal.Width
#> 1           5.0         3.5
#> 2           5.1         3.5
#> 3           6.4         2.8
#> 4           6.0         2.7
#> 5           5.9         3.0
#> 6           5.6         3.0
#> 7           6.8         3.0
#> 8           5.5         2.5
#> 9           6.5         3.0
#> 10          6.7         3.0
#> 11          6.5         2.8
#> 12          5.7         2.5
#> 13          5.1         3.8
#> 14          6.5         3.0
#> 15          5.5         2.3
#> 16          6.3         2.5
#> 17          7.2         3.0
#> 18          4.4         3.0
#> 19          5.5         2.4
#> 20          6.1         2.8

iris %>% 
  dplyr::select(1:2)%>% 
  dplyr::sample_n(20) %>% 
  dplyr::slice(1:5) %>%
  ripe(purrr::rerun,.n=3)
#> [[1]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width
#> 1          6.0         2.2
#> 2          4.8         3.0
#> 3          5.0         3.5
#> 4          5.4         3.7
#> 5          5.4         3.4
#> 
#> [[2]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width
#> 1          4.9         2.4
#> 2          4.7         3.2
#> 3          5.4         3.0
#> 4          5.0         2.0
#> 5          5.1         3.8
#> 
#> [[3]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width
#> 1          4.8         3.0
#> 2          4.9         3.1
#> 3          5.6         2.9
#> 4          5.0         3.2
#> 5          5.9         3.0
